name: BeltRouter-lite
title: BeltRouter Lite
author: pt
description:
This mod allows you to route belts and pipes automatically: 
  1. Put the starting belt and ending belt on ground first, 
  2. then select the starting belt with control+right-click and 
  3. select a ending belt with control+left-click.
  Boom, belt ghosts are created!
  (hint: you can also disable underground belt by shift+ctrl+left-click at the ending belt)
